title: Nina Burger
text:
Nina Burger (born 27 December 1987) is an <a href="Austria">Austria</a>n former <a href="Women%27s%20association%20football">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a>, who played for <a href="SC%20Sand">SC Sand</a> of <a href="Bundesliga%20%28women%29">Frauen Bundesliga</a>, after playing for <a href="SV%20Neulengbach">SV Neulengbach</a> of Austria's <a href="%C3%96FB-Frauenliga">ÖFB-Frauenliga</a>. She also played the 2014 season for the <a href="Houston%20Dash">Houston Dash</a> in the <a href="National%20Women%27s%20Soccer%20League">National Women's Soccer League</a> (NWSL). She was the ÖFB-Frauenliga's top scorer <a href="%C3%96FB-Frauenliga">for six seasons in a row between 2007 and 2012</a>.
On 1 April 2019, she announced retirement from the <a href="Austria%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Austrian national team</a>, after playing 108 matches with 53 goals.
